1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Usamah bin Zaid narrated that his father Zaid bin Harithah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Jibril taught me (how to perform) the ablution, and he ordered me to sprinkle water underneath my garment, lest a drop of urine leak out after the ablution.'" (Da'if) Other chains with similar wording

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي النَّضْحِ بَعْدَ الْوُضُوءِ
